release_notes:
• Splash screen on startup
• Progress bar with % inside
• Failed downloads saved to txt
• Mark as Downloaded feature
• Download & Stop button icons
• Auto update popup with release notes
• App close confirm dialog
• Download speed shown in log
• 5x faster downloads (5 threads)
• Manual update check button
• Window opens centered on screen
• JSON parsing fixed
• Version comparison fixed
• Taskbar icon fixed
• Paste box placeholder fixed
